content: this legal text discusses the progress of a case involving the division of an inheritance the court has determined the assets to be divided which include properties in turin and san mauro torinese the court assigns specific lots to ms ga ra and messrs gi ra fr ch adjustments and payments are ordered to be made between the parties the court also addresses the settlement of accounts related to the deceaseds movable assets such as bank accounts and securities experts appointed by the court have provided reports on the value of the assets and debts owed based on these reports the court determines the shares and obligations of each party the court also addresses other claims and expenses related to the property and funeral expenses in the final judgment the court declares that ms ga ra messrs gi ra and fr cizzotti are heirs to mr al ra and are entitled to a proportionate share of his assets specific lots are assigned to each party and certain payments are ordered between them ms ga ra is held liable for certain payments to mr gi ra claims relating to rendering accounts are dismissed and the parties are ordered to fully compensate the costs of the proceedings the court also orders the courtappointed experts report to be transcribed by the competent registrar of land registries
